alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 6:56PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Box Elder County through 745 PM MDT... At 656 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles east of Park Valley to 12 miles west of Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway and Locomotive Springs. This includes Utah Route 30 between mile markers 67 and 69, and near mile marker 87. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
